title: I'm A Bad Boy, But Please Love Me
alternative_title: 悪いコだけど愛してよ, Warui ko Dakedo Aishiteyo, I’m A Bad Boy, But Please Love Me
status: 悪いコだけど愛してよ, Warui ko Dakedo Aishiteyo, I’m A Bad Boy, But Please Love Me
description:
Description :
        Konoike Eishin, known as the Prince by his classmates, gets wrapped into the affairs of the mysterious and intimidating Senagawa Itsuki. After that, he just can't stop thinking about "Senagawa-kun".
